page.title: 08LIFE STYLES SHOPPING TRIPS
page.content: Shotts people do not think the shopping facilities are good. Twenty six shops are available at present,one of which is a small supermarket.A good number have closed their doors.The{Co-operative Society } which used to be very prosperous has contracted its operations severely. There are:8 hairdressers,4 banks,4 fish and chip shops-eternally popular-and 3 garages. Mothers of young schoolchildren will often combine the delivery of their offspring to school in the morning with a visit to the shops. Those who desire a greater choice of goods make the occasional trip to {Wishaw}or to{Glasgow.}A recent development has been the occasional organisation of busloads of shoppers to visit{England,}even{France,}surely a tiring if adventurous weekend trip.
